## CLI 
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:START (USAGE) -->
Name|Alias|Boolean|Default|Description
---|---|---|---|---
dryRun|d|true| |Run barrelify with no output \(prints the name of generated files\)
header|h| |\/\/ Generated File -- DO NOT EDIT|Define the header line to be added to the top of each file
exclude|e| | |List of files or folders to exclude
<!-- AUTO-GENERATED-CONTENT:END -->
